mapper.sql: a.id, a.user_id, a.coupon_id, a.`status`, a.add_time, a.used_time, a.order_id, a.order_price
LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_users b ON a.user_id=b.user_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders c ON a.order_id=c.order_id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon d ON a.coupon_id=d.id
mapper.select:
SELECT a.user_id, a.coupon_id, a.status, a.add_time, a.used_time, a.order_id, b.`nickname` as "name", c.order_amount as "orderAmount", d.coupon_name, d.coupon_type as "type", d.coupon_money FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user a
WHERE 1=1
AND a.coupon_id=#{couponId}
AND b.nickname like '%'||#{name}||'%' CONCAT('%',#{name}, '%')
AND a.status=#{status}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY a.add_time DESC
SELECT a.user_id, a.coupon_id, a.amount_id, a.status, a.add_time, a.used_time, a.order_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user a WHERE a.order_id=#{orderId}

SELECT c.id as "actionId", c.`name` as "actionName", b.id as "counponId", b.coupon_name as "counponName", b.coupon_type as "type", b.used_type as "usedType", b.base_amount as "baseAmount", b.coupon_money as "couponMoney" FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon b ON a.coupon_id=b.id LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_activity c ON c.id=b.action_id WHERE a.`status`=1 AND a.order_id=#{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user ( user_id, coupon_id, status, add_time, used_time, order_id, order_price )SELECT mu.user_id, #{couponId}, '0', SYSDATE(), NULL, NULL, NULL FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users mu WHERE mu.del_flag = 0 AND user_id IN ( SELECT su.mtmy_user_id FROM trains.sys_user su )

INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user ( user_id, coupon_id, status, add_time, used_time, order_id, order_price )SELECT mu.user_id, #{couponId}, '0', SYSDATE(), NULL, NULL, NULL FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users mu WHERE mu.del_flag=0 AND user_id NOT IN ( SELECT su.mtmy_user_id FROM trains.sys_user su )
INSERT INTO mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user ( user_id, coupon_id, status, add_time, used_time, order_id, order_price )VALUES( #{userId}, #{couponId}, #{status}, SYSDATE(), null, null, null )
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) AS num FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user WHERE coupon_id in (#{couponId}) AND `status`=0 AND user_id IN ( SELECT mtmy_user_id FROM trains.sys_user WHERE mtmy_user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users ) )

SELECT count(*) AS num FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user WHERE coupon_id IN (#{couponId}) AND `status`=0 AND user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users WHERE user_id NOT IN ( SELECT mtmy_user_id FROM trains.sys_user ) )
SELECT count(*) as num FROM mtmydb.mtmy_activity_coupon_user WHERE coupon_id=#{couponId} and user_id=#{userId} and status=0
